headline.main: CUDAHY URGES U.S. MEDIATE A PEACE; Opposes Ship Arming, Denies at Senate Hearing Hitler Has Any Designs in West

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 23 -- A proposal that the United States Government offer itself as a mediator to negotiate peace between Hitler and the non-Axis Allies was made to the Senate Foreign Relations Committee today by John Cudahy, former Ambassador to Belgium.
abstract: arming opposed and peace negotiations urged by J Cudahy
